long_description: Offering a barefoot feel, the men's Inov8 F-Lite 192 multisport shoes are built for intense training sessions, from HIIT to Crossfit and everything in between. Highly breathable polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly for comfort. Injected EVA midsoles cushion each step, and offer lightweight support. 0mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a more natural forefoot strike. Reinforced medial and lateral sections offer increased protection. Dynamic polymer shanks offer lightweight support and structure. Rubber outsoles on the F-Lite 192 shoes from Inov8 offer a sure grip on indoor and outdoor surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan friendly.
short_description: Offering a barefoot feel, the men's Inov8 F-Lite 192 multisport shoes are built for intense training sessions, from HIIT to Crossfit and everything in between.
